fullText: Though John's pop sensibilities don't always mesh with the story's more serious themes, Katie Brayben delivers a tour-de-force performance as the titular televangelism icon.
dtliExcerpt: Though John's pop sensibilities don't always mesh with the story's more serious themes, Katie Brayben delivers a tour-de-force performance as the titular televangelism icon.
showScoreExcerpt: Though John's pop sensibilities don't always mesh with the story's more serious themes, Katie Brayben delivers a tour-de-force performance as the titular televangelism icon.
nycTheatreExcerpt: "The new Broadway musical "Tammy Faye" touches on all of these points of view but lands on none with any sense of confidence, consistency, or purpose. It's as messy as Tammy's mascara."
